result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:48 AM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin, Defendant Zachery Benjamin Beckman in court. DE states that he has not retained private counsel yet. DE would like to apply for court-appointed attorney. RECESS. 11:09 AM - Case recalled. Appearances as previously noted. Court reviews PFAC. DE sworn. Court questions DE. Court finds DE does not qualify for court-appointed attorney. DE will retain private counsel. Court sets STC for attorney status. Adjourned: 11:13 AM. kma
Status conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Status conference on October 28, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Criminal Scheduling Order. Signed by SJN on 10/6/22. ec: Attys. kma

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Christa N.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:23 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson in court for DE for today. Defendant Zachery Benjamin Beckman in court in custody by video. DE does not qualify for public defender, DE intends to hire private counsel. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading.  NG, pre plea rights preserved. Bond arguments. Court sets bond. Court sets STC for attorney status, SETC and PSC. Adjourned: 1:32 PM. kma
Status conference scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.
